label: Štamberg, Stanislav.  2016. A new actinopterygian species of Igornichthys Heyler, 1972 from the Permian of the Krkonoše Piedmont Basin (Bohemian Massif, Czech Republic), and its relationship to the actinopterygians of other European Permo-Carboniferous basins. Geodiversitas 38(4): 475-488.
value: Štamberg, Stanislav.  2016. A new actinopterygian species of Igornichthys Heyler, 1972 from the Permian of the Krkonoše Piedmont Basin (Bohemian Massif, Czech Republic), and its relationship to the actinopterygians of other European Permo-Carboniferous basins. Geodiversitas 38(4): 475-488.
